p: The measurements performed on the suspensions with an initial amount of 1% oil and a second oil supply of 1% during incubation showed an increase in total cell and CFU concentration in the first few days of incubation (Figures 3 and 4). The median total cell and CFU concentration at day 4 and later (Time >2 days) and at day 7 and later (Time ≥7 days) of the different media are listed in Supporting Information Table S1.
